title: 求助关于Statistics连接数据库问题
author: Weixiaojun233
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Weixiaojun0.0 于 2018-5-8 22:58 编辑 
日志如下:

[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] Enabling Statistics v1.2.4
[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] +------ [ Fetching Patches ] ------+
[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 1.yaspx.sql        |
[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 2.yaspx.sql        |
[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 3.yaspx.sql        |
[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 4.yaspx.sql        |
[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 5.yaspx.sql        |
[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 6.yaspx.sql        |
[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 7.yaspx.sql        |
[12:58:37 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 8.yaspx.sql        |
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 9.yaspx.sql        |
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 10.yaspx.sql       |
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 11.yaspx.sql       |
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 12.yaspx.sql       |
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 13.yaspx.sql       |
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Copying 14.yaspx.sql       |
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] |  All patch files are up to date  |
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] +----------------------------------+
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] Book.yml not found. Creating one for you.
[12:58:38 WARN]: Thu Apr 05 12:58:38 CST 2018 WARN: Establishing SSL connection without server's identity verification is not recommended. According to MySQL 5.5.45+, 5.6.26+ and 5.7.6+ requirements SSL connection must be established by default if explicit option isn't set. For compliance with existing applications not using SSL the verifyServerCertificate property is set to 'false'. You need either to explicitly disable SSL by setting useSSL=false, or set useSSL=true and provide truststore for server certificate verification.
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] +-------] Database Patcher [-------+
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] |       Applying patch 1 / 14       |
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] Connection is still present. Malformed query detected.
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] Connection is still present. Malformed query detected.
[12:58:38 INFO]: [Statistics] Connection is still present. Malformed query detected.
[12:58:38 ERROR]: [Statistics] Cannot establish a database connection!
[12:58:38 ERROR]: [Statistics] Is the plugin set up correctly?


注:

在插件和MYSQL配置文件中并找不到UseSSL的配置项。。。

AutuMe可以正常使用MYSQL数据库。

replies.author: 兄弟兄弟
replies.txt_content:
Book.yml not found. Creating one for you.复制代码根据此报错信息，我们可以得知你没有这个的配置文档，于是程序提示给你创建了一个，
这个报错是无法连接到数据库的意思：Cannot establish a database connection!复制代码
可能相关配置信息在程序自动创建的Book.yml这个文件里，你需要进去进行配置数据库连接相关参数。
Establishing SSL connection without server's identity verification is not recommended. According to MySQL 5.5.45+, 5.6.26+ and 5.7.6+ requirements SSL connection must be established by default if explicit option isn't set. For compliance with existing applications not using SSL the verifyServerCertificate property is set to 'false'. You need either to explicitly disable SSL by setting useSSL=false, or set useSSL=true and provide truststore for server certificate verification.复制代码
这个是告诉你如果不使用ssl的话就设置关闭，貌似也是在那个Book.yml里，确保useSSL这一行是useSSL=false复制代码

replies.author: Weixiaojun233
replies.txt_content:
兄弟兄弟 发表于 2018-4-5 16:58
根据此报错信息，我们可以得知你没有这个的配置文档，于是程序提示给你创建了一个，

可能相关配置信息在程 ...
在book.yml中并没有useSSL这个配置项啊。。。
